name: ClockChime
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: clock chime
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill will play the current clock chimes when requested. To scheduling clock chimes on the hour you will need to enable a separate Alexa skill such as "Time Trigger" and configure a routine to open this skill when the Time Trigger device is pressed.
